sentences.sContent: Such a state of affairs is entirely impermissible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such a state of affairs is entirely impermissible.
sentences.sCn: 这种状态是完全不能容许的。

sentences.sContent: Cma argued that this shift went well beyond the knee of the curve and was therefore impermissible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cma argued that this shift went well beyond the knee of the curve and was therefore impermissible.
sentences.sCn: “化学药品制造商协会”主张，这次转化顺利地超越了“曲线拐点”，因此是不允许的。

trans.tranOther: something that is impermissible cannot be allowed
